text: All my movies are achingly personal.
author: Quentin Tarantino

text: I have loved movies as the number one thing in my life so long that I can't ever remember a time when I didn't.
author: Quentin Tarantino

text: I just grew up watching a lot of movies. I'm attracted to this genre and that genre, this type of story, and that type of story. As I watch movies I make some version of it in my head that isn't quite what I'm seeing - taking the things I like and mixing them with stuff I've never seen before.
author: Quentin Tarantino

text: Some mornings you wake up and think, gee I look handsome today. Other days I think, what am I doing in the movies? I wanna go back to Ireland and drive a forklift.
author: Liam Neeson

text: I don't really have a schedule of when I want to show my children my movies.
author: Steven Spielberg
